page.title: 14Houses in and Around Norwell
page.content: The only residential areas are the villages of{Norwell}and{Cromwell.}At the time of our survey there were only 9 properties for sale, all being in the village of Norwell. The average price of properties for sale was over {Â£71,000.}The average price for a 3 bedroom house in Nottinghamshire is {Â£25,000}which illustrates how exclusive these properties for sale are. A typical e.g. is{Ash House, Â£69,500. "An imposing Georgian detached family residence occupying a prominent position on the outskirts of this pretty village which has good local amenities available and is within easy driving distance of{Newark, Nottingham and{Southwell}where more comprehensive facilites are available. The A1 trunk road and the high speed train from Newark give ideal access to{London." }
